name: Solar System 2.0
description:
Hey! Hi!

If you want to see a highly inaccurate but cute lil solar system model, check this out!

I added the following elements in the original release:

  1. Realistic textures and specular shaders (high smoothness but low shine for ideal "planets in space" look)
  2. A separate sun halo object, for more realistic glow effect
  3. Varied pitch for planet hum based on size (so they harmonize with each other when they pass by!)
  4. An absurdly simple "UI" (it only includes the background for the mini-map and the mini-map itself; it also scales to the screen)

... and added these additional ones in version 2.0:

  1. A new environment, originally created in Blender by anDDDres on Sketchfab and modified by me in Blender to suit the game
  2. An original Blender model of an 8-planet orrery (excluding moons)
    1. The arms, poles, and their respective planets rotate together around the "Sun" parent game object to mimic a motorized/mechanical model!
    2. The "wiring" runs up through the center pole to the "SunStar" game object, which is, in fiction, a semi-translucent sphere with a light inside! Pretty neat!

Credits:

  • Textures by Solar System Scope
  • "90's Teen Bedroom" model by anDDDres
